Module it.polimi.demo.ingsw2024pucciruggierisantarossasciarretta
Package it.polimi.demo.view.dynamic

Class GameDynamic

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.demo.view.dynamic.GameDynamic
All Implemented Interfaces:
Listener, ClientInterface, Serializable, Runnable, Remote
public class GameDynamic extends Object implements Listener, Runnable, ClientInterface
The GameDynamic class represents the dynamic part of the game, handling game events and state changes.
See Also:
